meanings.sent1: After the storm, the family refortifies their home to keep it safe.
meanings.sent2: The knight refortifies his armor before heading into battle.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel refortifies its nest with extra twigs for a cozy winter.
meanings.sent4: She refortifies her resolve to overcome any obstacles in her path.
meanings.sent5: The chef refortifies the soup with a dash of spices for extra flavor.

meanings.sent1: The engineers refortify the castle walls to withstand enemy attacks.
meanings.sent2: The general decides to refortify the troops with more supplies for the long march.
meanings.sent3: The students refortify their group project with colorful illustrations for a creative touch.
meanings.sent4: The community refortifies its bonds by coming together to support each other in times of need.
meanings.sent5: The gardener refortifies the fence with sturdy posts to keep the rabbits out of the garden.
